outerHTML:
Pi.Alert LXC

Pi.Alert is a WIFI / LAN intruder detector. Checks the devices connected and alert you with unknown devices. It also warns of the disconnection of "always connected" devices.

To create a new Proxmox VE Pi.Alert LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Pi.Alert, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/pialert.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 3GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Pi.Alert Interface: IP/pialert/
